<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Inserts the address range. If the range overlaps with an existing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// range, the range that it overlaps with will be returned and the two</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// address ranges will be unioned together in &quot;Ranges&quot;. If a duplicate</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// entry is attempted to be added, the duplicate range will not actually be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// added and the returned iterator will point to end().</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// - invalid file indexes</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Verify that an Apple-style accelerator table is valid.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This function currently checks that:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// - The fixed part of the header fits in the section</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// - The size of the section is as large as what the header describes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// - There is at least one atom</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// - The form for each atom is valid</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// - The tag for each DIE in the table is valid</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// - The buckets have a valid index, or they are empty</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// - Each hashdata offset is valid</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// - Each DIE is valid</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param AccelSection pointer to the section containing the acceleration table</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Verify that the DWARF v5 accelerator table is valid.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This function currently checks that:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// - Headers individual Name Indices fit into the section and can be parsed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// - Abbreviation tables can be parsed and contain valid index attributes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   with correct form encodings.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// - The CU lists reference existing compile units.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// - The buckets have a valid index, or they are empty.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// - All names are reachable via the hash table (they have the correct hash,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   and the hash is in the correct bucket).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// - Information in the index entries is complete (all required entries are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   present) and consistent with the debug&#95;info section DIEs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param AccelSection section containing the acceleration table</span></CodeLine>
